languages.text: Прокторы стоят во главе небольших оперативных отрядов Арбитес и подчиняются напрямую действующему Маршалу. Они могут выполнять различные по важности задания — от поимки самых опасных преступников Простора до обычного патрулирования районов в мирах-ульях.

traits.locale_text: Прокторы стоят во главе небольших оперативных отрядов Арбитес и подчиняются напрямую действующему Маршалу. Они могут выполнять различные по важности задания — от поимки самых опасных преступников Простора до обычного патрулирования районов в мирах-ульях.

languages.text: Proctors command small operational squads of the Adeptus Arbites and report directly to the acting Marshal. Their duties range from capturing the most dangerous criminals in the Expanse to conducting routine patrols within hive world districts.
languages.original_text: Прокторы стоят во главе небольших оперативных отрядов Арбитес и подчиняются напрямую действующему Маршалу. Они могут выполнять различные по важности задания — от поимки самых опасных преступников Простора до обычного патрулирования районов в мирах-ульях.

traits.locale_text: Proctors command small operational squads of the Adeptus Arbites and report directly to the acting Marshal. Their duties range from the capture of the most dangerous criminals in the Expanse to routine patrols within hive world districts.

Proctors command small operational squads of the Adeptus Arbites and report directly to the acting Marshal. Their duties range from the capture of the most dangerous criminals in the Expanse to routine patrols within hive world districts.

Proctors command small operational squads of the Adeptus Arbites and report directly to the acting Marshal. Their duties range from capturing the most dangerous criminals in the Expanse to conducting routine patrols within hive world districts.

Proctors command small operational squads of the Adeptus Arbites and report directly to the acting Marshal. Their duties range from capturing the most dangerous criminals in the Expanse to conducting routine patrols within hive world districts.

languages.text: プロクターはアデプトゥス・アルビテスの小規模な実動小隊を率い、代理のマーシャルの直属だ。任務は、エクスパンスで最凶の犯罪者を確保することから、ハイヴ・ワールドの地区での通常巡回まで幅広い。
languages.original_text: Proctors command small operational squads of the Adeptus Arbites and report directly to the acting Marshal. Their duties range from capturing the most dangerous criminals in the Expanse to conducting routine patrols within hive world districts.

traits.locale_text: プロクターはアデプトゥス・アルビテスの小規模な実動小隊を率い、代理のマーシャルの直属だ。任務は、エクスパンスで最凶の犯罪者を確保することから、ハイヴ・ワールドの地区での通常巡回まで幅広い。

languages.text: Los procuradores lideran escuadras de agentes del Adeptus Arbites y responden directamente ante el mariscal en funciones. Sus funciones son variadas, desde capturar a los criminales más peligrosos de la Extensión hasta realizar patrullas rutinarias por los distritos de los mundos colmena.
languages.original_text: Proctors command small operational squads of the Adeptus Arbites and report directly to the acting Marshal. Their duties range from capturing the most dangerous criminals in the Expanse to conducting routine patrols within hive world districts.

traits.locale_text: Los procuradores lideran escuadras de agentes del Adeptus Arbites y responden directamente ante el mariscal en funciones. Sus funciones son variadas, desde capturar a los criminales más peligrosos de la Extensión hasta realizar patrullas rutinarias por los distritos de los mundos colmena.

languages.text: 监察官负责指挥帝国法务部的小型行动分队，同时向代理元帅本人进行汇报。他们的职责范围很广，既包括抓捕整个科罗努斯扩区最危险的罪犯，也包括在巢都世界进行例行巡逻。
languages.original_text: Proctors command small operational squads of the Adeptus Arbites and report directly to the acting Marshal. Their duties range from capturing the most dangerous criminals in the Expanse to conducting routine patrols within hive world districts.

traits.locale_text: 监察官负责指挥帝国法务部的小型行动分队，同时向代理元帅本人进行汇报。他们的职责范围很广，既包括抓捕整个科罗努斯扩区最危险的罪犯，也包括在巢都世界进行例行巡逻。

languages.text: Proktoren befehligen kleine Kommandos des Adeptus Arbites und unterstehen direkt dem diensthabenden Marschall. Ihre Pflichten umfassen die Festsetzung gefährlicher Krimineller in der Ausdehnung ebenso wie Routinepatrouillen in Makropolwelten.
languages.original_text: Proctors command small operational squads of the Adeptus Arbites and report directly to the acting Marshal. Their duties range from capturing the most dangerous criminals in the Expanse to conducting routine patrols within hive world districts.

traits.locale_text: Proktoren befehligen kleine Kommandos des Adeptus Arbites und unterstehen direkt dem diensthabenden Marschall. Ihre Pflichten umfassen die Festsetzung gefährlicher Krimineller in der Ausdehnung ebenso wie Routinepatrouillen in Makropolwelten.

languages.text: Les proctors sont à la tête de petites escouades opérationnelles de l'Adeptus Arbites et rendent directement compte au maréchal. Leurs missions sont variées, ils peuvent aussi bien capturer les criminels les plus dangereux des Étendues que mener des patrouilles de routine dans les quartiers du monde ruche.
languages.original_text: Proctors command small operational squads of the Adeptus Arbites and report directly to the acting Marshal. Their duties range from capturing the most dangerous criminals in the Expanse to conducting routine patrols within hive world districts.

traits.locale_text: Les proctors sont à la tête de petites escouades opérationnelles de l'Adeptus Arbites et rendent directement compte au maréchal. Leurs missions sont variées, ils peuvent aussi bien capturer les criminels les plus dangereux des Étendues que mener des patrouilles de routine dans les quartiers du monde ruche.

languages.text: Üsteğmenler, Adeptus Arbites'in küçük operasyon mangalarına komuta eder ve doğrudan görev başındaki Miralay'a rapor verirler. Vazifeleri, Enginlik'teki en tehlikeli suçluları yakalamaktan kovan dünya semtlerinde rutin devriye gezmeye kadar uzanır.
languages.original_text: Proctors command small operational squads of the Adeptus Arbites and report directly to the acting Marshal. Their duties range from capturing the most dangerous criminals in the Expanse to conducting routine patrols within hive world districts.

traits.locale_text: Üsteğmenler, Adeptus Arbites'in küçük operasyon mangalarına komuta eder ve doğrudan görev başındaki Miralay'a rapor verirler. Vazifeleri, Enginlik'teki en tehlikeli suçluları yakalamaktan kovan dünya semtlerinde rutin devriye gezmeye kadar uzanır.
